achievements.name: True Torment
achievements.description: It lasts forever.
achievements.instructions: Note the ghosts.

achievements.name: The Firmament Moves
achievements.description: Number fourteen? More like number one.
achievements.instructions: Three times does it move, but most only know one. What you seek is something different yet again, warped three times over.

achievements.name: Too Fast, Too Furious
achievements.description: A march if you have eight feet, maybe!
achievements.instructions: Something you don't do when you're afraid.

achievements.name: Feelin' It
achievements.description: Got with the times.
achievements.instructions: Beats multiplied. A lot of them.

achievements.name: Overconfident
achievements.description: Try again later, maybe?
achievements.instructions: The 's' in progress stands for hubris.

achievements.name: Spooked
achievements.description: Something moved. It wasn't your cursor!
achievements.instructions: Don't look behind you.

achievements.name: Skylord
achievements.description: Never miss a wingbeat.
achievements.instructions: Flight among the sky requires nothing but perfection.

achievements.name: B-Rave
achievements.description: It takes courage to stand before the master.
achievements.instructions: Ill-tempered bosses make for excellent final battles.

achievements.name: Any%
achievements.description: A speedrunner's best friend.
achievements.instructions: Sometimes you have to break the rules to work with speed.

achievements.name: Mirage
achievements.description: The horizon goes on forever, and ever, and ever...
achievements.instructions: The light is far harder than it seems.

achievements.name: Under The Stars
achievements.description: Onwards, to where the darkness can never stop us.
achievements.instructions: Walk beneath the stars on a journey to elsewhere.

achievements.name: Senseless
achievements.description: I hear nothing. I see nothing.
achievements.instructions: A song that is, and something that is not.

achievements.name: Upon The Wind
achievements.description: And in that gale, no eye could hope to follow.
achievements.instructions: In the heart of a storm of flowers, a world unseen.

achievements.name: Vantage
achievements.description: There we stood, where the spires pierced the sky, and dreamed of the future to come.
achievements.instructions: Where ground was broken to critical acclaim.

achievements.name: Efflorescence
achievements.description: A lament for the past, and a glimpse into tomorrow.
achievements.instructions: The horizon thunders with a portentous bloom.

achievements.name: Inundate
achievements.description: Swept away.
achievements.instructions: Across and beyond the tides.

achievements.name: Not Bluffing
achievements.description: Did that with my eyes closed.
achievements.instructions: It's not arrogance if you can live up to it.

achievements.name: Eureka!
achievements.description: By Jove, you've got it!
achievements.instructions: When inspiration strikes...

achievements.name: Regicide
achievements.description: A king no more.
achievements.instructions: No throne lasts forever.

achievements.name: Permadeath
achievements.description: One life, one shot.
achievements.instructions: Better make it count! Ware well the example of the white cat.

achievements.name: The Future Is Now
achievements.description: The stars showed you all that was to come.
achievements.instructions: Withstand the primordial.

achievements.name: Natural 20
achievements.description: Rolled it.
achievements.instructions: Not just a chance of the dice, this one is all skill.

achievements.name: Dead Center
achievements.description: As all things should be.
achievements.instructions: Perfect balance.

achievements.name: Final Boss
achievements.description: Game over.
achievements.instructions: Let the credits roll.

achievements.name: AHAHAHAHA
achievements.description: TOGETHER FOREVER.
achievements.instructions: Who am I? Where am I? What the hell IS this place?

achievements.name: Beast Mode
achievements.description: Unleash the animal within!
achievements.instructions: Go absolutely feral.

achievements.name: Lightless
achievements.description: Better the devil you know.
achievements.instructions: I CAN'T SEE A THING.

achievements.name: Mortal Coils
achievements.description: Never one without the other.
achievements.instructions: Prisoners of flesh in an unending apocalypse.

achievements.name: Dark Familiarity
achievements.description: No mistakes, no witnesses.
achievements.instructions: Don't second guess yourself.

achievements.name: Creator's Gambit
achievements.description: I made this.
achievements.instructions: Make your own prize.

achievements.name: Unseen Heights
achievements.description: Reach for the stars.
achievements.instructions: Go where even the editor fears to tread.

achievements.name: Astronomic
achievements.description: Precision machinery.
achievements.instructions: Celestial coordinates: 284-905.

achievements.name: Iron Will
achievements.description: A legacy of broken bonds, remade.
achievements.instructions: Step forth, and master three years of titan-ending tests.

achievements.name: Star Power
achievements.description: AND I'LL DO IT AGAIN.
achievements.instructions: When an encore just isn't enough.

achievements.name: Causality
achievements.description: Definitely not for casuals.
achievements.instructions: Flee from the future.

achievements.name: Abrogation
achievements.description: Endure not the imposition of celestial law.
achievements.instructions: Return to whence the rules were first broken.

achievements.name: Internment
achievements.description: Stained in the hues of madness, they rage within a four-walled jail.
achievements.instructions: Bask in the shade of an ailing mind.

achievements.name: Anabasis
achievements.description: And what an adventure you had.
achievements.instructions: Life is but a journey of the senses.

achievements.name: Literal
achievements.description: The instructions were very clear.
achievements.instructions: ...but probably not optimal.

achievements.name: Banana Republic
achievements.description: Potassium overdose.
achievements.instructions: The more may not always be the merrier.

achievements.name: Hybrid Hyperion
achievements.description: Manifold conqueror.
achievements.instructions: You proteans should show off more.

achievements.name: Divination Break
achievements.description: So cold...
achievements.instructions: The frozen thread shattered.

achievements.name: Unwilted
achievements.description: Vivid recollection of a forgotten memory.
achievements.instructions: Flourish anew like it was yesterday.

achievements.name: Finality
achievements.description: High stakes, no regrets.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the Sudden Death mod enabled!

achievements.name: Perfectionist
achievements.description: Accept nothing but the best.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the Perfect mod enabled!

achievements.name: Rock Around The Clock
achievements.description: You can't stop the rock.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the Hard Rock mod enabled!

achievements.name: Time And A Half
achievements.description: Having a right ol' time. One and a half of them, almost.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the DoubleTime mod enabled!

achievements.name: Sweet Rave Party
achievements.description: Founded in the fine tradition of changing things that were just fine as they were.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the Nightcore mod enabled!

achievements.name: Blindsight
achievements.description: I can see just perfectly.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the Hidden mod enabled!

achievements.name: Are You Afraid Of The Dark?
achievements.description: Harder than it looks, probably because it's hard to look.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the Flashlight mod enabled!

achievements.name: Dial It Right Back
achievements.description: Sometimes you just want to take it easy.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the Easy mod enabled!

achievements.name: Risk Averse
achievements.description: Safety nets are fun!
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the No Fail mod enabled!

achievements.description: You got there. Eventually.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the HalfTime mod enabled!

achievements.description: One cannot always spin to win.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the Spun Out mod enabled!

achievements.description: Longer is shorter when all is said and done.

achievements.description: Do it for real next time.
achievements.instructions: Preparation is key for all successful endeavours.

achievements.description: Something new born from absence.

achievements.description: Throw it all to the wind.
achievements.instructions: Do it just because you can, even if the stakes are high.

achievements.description: But it was right there..
achievements.instructions: Afraid of the dark?

achievements.name: Behold No Deception
achievements.description: That wasn't easy at all!
achievements.instructions: Sometimes the hard way is in fact, easier.

achievements.name: Lights Out
achievements.description: The party's just getting started.
achievements.instructions: Set the mood.

achievements.description: In the mire of thawing time, memory shall be your guide.
achievements.instructions: When time runs slow and sight fails you, how will you succeed?

achievements.name: Camera Shy
achievements.description: Stop being cute.
achievements.instructions: Uguu.

achievements.name: The Sum Of All Fears
achievements.description: Unfortunate.
achievements.instructions: The end comes when you least expect it.

achievements.name: Dekasight
achievements.description: So big, yet so hard to see.
achievements.instructions: Size isn't everything.

achievements.name: Hour Before The Dawn
achievements.description: Eleven skies of everlasting sunrise.
achievements.instructions: The night where we belong.

achievements.name: Slow And Steady
achievements.description: Win the race, or start again.
achievements.instructions: Take your time.

achievements.name: No Time To Spare
achievements.description: Places to be, things to do.
achievements.instructions: Think fast, click fast, be fast.

achievements.name: Sognare
achievements.description: A dream in stop-motion, soon forever gone.
achievements.instructions: "I saw three spires all around, and a world in halted time.."

achievements.name: Realtor Extraordinaire
achievements.description: An acre-wide stride.
achievements.instructions: The wrong kind of house.

achievements.description: So many pretty colours. Most of them red.
achievements.instructions: See the tiny colours up through the tube up close and personal, and slow right down.

achievements.name: Meticulous
achievements.description: The circle goes here, and then here, and then here..
achievements.instructions: This is the way it's SUPPOSED to be.

achievements.name: Infinitesimal
achievements.description: Big word for something so very, very small.
achievements.instructions: Tiny in scope, big in meaning.

achievements.name: Equilibrium
achievements.description: Balance in all things.
achievements.instructions: Seek the middle ground.

achievements.name: Impeccable
achievements.description: Speed matters not to the exemplary.
achievements.instructions: Simply superb.

achievements.name: Quick Maths
achievements.description: Beats per minute over... this isn't quick at all!
achievements.instructions: Where x equals beats per minute, and a variable unknown...

achievements.name: Valediction
achievements.description: One last time.
achievements.instructions: Time stood still as we waved farewell.

achievements.name: Ten To One
achievements.description: From one extreme to another.
achievements.instructions: From a marathon to a sprint.

achievements.name: Exquisite
achievements.description: Indubitably.
achievements.instructions: Do it once with true calibre, then do it again.

achievements.name: Persistence Is Key
achievements.description: Don't let your dreams be dreams.
achievements.instructions: Don't give up!

achievements.name: Mad Scientist
achievements.description: The experiment... it's all gone!
achievements.instructions: Become invisible.

achievements.name: Tribulation
achievements.description: Success is inevitable... eventually.
achievements.instructions: Struggle and then stop.

achievements.description: The first minute is always the hardest.
achievements.instructions: Every hour's got sixty, but your timer only wants one.

achievements.name: Replica
achievements.description: One just like the other.
achievements.instructions: Duplicate.

achievements.name: All Good
achievements.description: Better now, thanks!
achievements.instructions: You got this.

achievements.description: In loving memory of your sanity, long forgotten.
achievements.instructions: Conquer a test of the most frustrating combination of mods imaginable.

achievements.name: Sanguine
achievements.description: Timeless thorns still draw blood.
achievements.instructions: Return to the past, when everything was simpler.

achievements.description: Regret everything.

achievements.description: The challenge remains.
achievements.instructions: Turn a short challenge into a long one.

achievements.instructions: You don't need a hint for this one.

achievements.description: Rise from the depths into a new age.

achievements.name: Unstoppable
achievements.description: Holy shit.
achievements.instructions: Reaching the limits of mortal skill.

achievements.name: Is This Real Life?
achievements.description: You did NOT just pull that off.
achievements.instructions: The absolute height of perfection.

achievements.name: Realität
achievements.description: A moonlight butterfly, and beacons of three.
achievements.instructions: Dream of greater heights.

achievements.name: Our Mechanical Benefactors
achievements.description: Human, please explain directive "GREED".
achievements.instructions: Close, yet so far.

achievements.name: Elite
achievements.description: Dangerous beat agents.
achievements.instructions: A challenge for status, prestige and fame is not always the smartest thing to do in the middle of something.

achievements.description: Half full or half empty, that's a whole lot of fifty.
achievements.instructions: Strong opinions about this, one way or another.

achievements.name: Thrill of the Chase
achievements.description: My heart's beating, my hands are shaking, and I'm STILL clicking.
achievements.instructions: Is there anything better than the hunt? Such a classic pursuit.

achievements.name: The Girl in the Forest
achievements.description: Not even the Elite Four could stop you now.
achievements.instructions: Think back to where it all began, in shades of red and blue..

achievements.name: You Can't Hide
achievements.description: I will find you, and I will click you. All of you.
achievements.instructions: Don't even try to hide.

achievements.name: True Torment
achievements.description: It lasts forever.
achievements.instructions: Note the ghosts.

achievements.name: The Firmament Moves
achievements.description: Number fourteen? More like number one.
achievements.instructions: Three times does it move, but most only know one. What you seek is something different yet again, warped three times over.

achievements.name: Too Fast, Too Furious
achievements.description: A march if you have eight feet, maybe!
achievements.instructions: Something you don't do when you're afraid.

achievements.name: Feelin' It
achievements.description: Got with the times.
achievements.instructions: Beats multiplied. A lot of them.

achievements.name: Overconfident
achievements.description: Try again later, maybe?
achievements.instructions: The 's' in progress stands for hubris.

achievements.name: Spooked
achievements.description: Something moved. It wasn't your cursor!
achievements.instructions: Don't look behind you.

achievements.name: Skylord
achievements.description: Never miss a wingbeat.
achievements.instructions: Flight among the sky requires nothing but perfection.

achievements.name: B-Rave
achievements.description: It takes courage to stand before the master.
achievements.instructions: Ill-tempered bosses make for excellent final battles.

achievements.name: Any%
achievements.description: A speedrunner's best friend.
achievements.instructions: Sometimes you have to break the rules to work with speed.

achievements.name: Mirage
achievements.description: The horizon goes on forever, and ever, and ever...
achievements.instructions: The light is far harder than it seems.

achievements.name: Under The Stars
achievements.description: Onwards, to where the darkness can never stop us.
achievements.instructions: Walk beneath the stars on a journey to elsewhere.

achievements.name: Senseless
achievements.description: I hear nothing. I see nothing.
achievements.instructions: A song that is, and something that is not.

achievements.name: Upon The Wind
achievements.description: And in that gale, no eye could hope to follow.
achievements.instructions: In the heart of a storm of flowers, a world unseen.

achievements.name: Vantage
achievements.description: There we stood, where the spires pierced the sky, and dreamed of the future to come.
achievements.instructions: Where ground was broken to critical acclaim.

achievements.name: Efflorescence
achievements.description: A lament for the past, and a glimpse into tomorrow.
achievements.instructions: The horizon thunders with a portentous bloom.

achievements.name: Inundate
achievements.description: Swept away.
achievements.instructions: Across and beyond the tides.

achievements.name: Not Bluffing
achievements.description: Did that with my eyes closed.
achievements.instructions: It's not arrogance if you can live up to it.

achievements.name: Eureka!
achievements.description: By Jove, you've got it!
achievements.instructions: When inspiration strikes...

achievements.name: Regicide
achievements.description: A king no more.
achievements.instructions: No throne lasts forever.

achievements.name: Permadeath
achievements.description: One life, one shot.
achievements.instructions: Better make it count! Ware well the example of the white cat.

achievements.name: The Future Is Now
achievements.description: The stars showed you all that was to come.
achievements.instructions: Withstand the primordial.

achievements.name: Natural 20
achievements.description: Rolled it.
achievements.instructions: Not just a chance of the dice, this one is all skill.

achievements.name: Dead Center
achievements.description: As all things should be.
achievements.instructions: Perfect balance.

achievements.name: Final Boss
achievements.description: Game over.
achievements.instructions: Let the credits roll.

achievements.name: AHAHAHAHA
achievements.description: TOGETHER FOREVER.
achievements.instructions: Who am I? Where am I? What the hell IS this place?

achievements.name: Beast Mode
achievements.description: Unleash the animal within!
achievements.instructions: Go absolutely feral.

achievements.name: Lightless
achievements.description: Better the devil you know.
achievements.instructions: I CAN'T SEE A THING.

achievements.name: Mortal Coils
achievements.description: Never one without the other.
achievements.instructions: Prisoners of flesh in an unending apocalypse.

achievements.name: Dark Familiarity
achievements.description: No mistakes, no witnesses.
achievements.instructions: Don't second guess yourself.

achievements.name: Creator's Gambit
achievements.description: I made this.
achievements.instructions: Make your own prize.

achievements.name: Unseen Heights
achievements.description: Reach for the stars.
achievements.instructions: Go where even the editor fears to tread.

achievements.name: Astronomic
achievements.description: Precision machinery.
achievements.instructions: Celestial coordinates: 284-905.

achievements.name: Iron Will
achievements.description: A legacy of broken bonds, remade.
achievements.instructions: Step forth, and master three years of titan-ending tests.

achievements.name: Star Power
achievements.description: AND I'LL DO IT AGAIN.
achievements.instructions: When an encore just isn't enough.

achievements.name: Causality
achievements.description: Definitely not for casuals.
achievements.instructions: Flee from the future.

achievements.name: Abrogation
achievements.description: Endure not the imposition of celestial law.
achievements.instructions: Return to whence the rules were first broken.

achievements.name: Internment
achievements.description: Stained in the hues of madness, they rage within a four-walled jail.
achievements.instructions: Bask in the shade of an ailing mind.

achievements.name: Anabasis
achievements.description: And what an adventure you had.
achievements.instructions: Life is but a journey of the senses.

achievements.name: Literal
achievements.description: The instructions were very clear.
achievements.instructions: ...but probably not optimal.

achievements.name: Banana Republic
achievements.description: Potassium overdose.
achievements.instructions: The more may not always be the merrier.

achievements.name: Hybrid Hyperion
achievements.description: Manifold conqueror.
achievements.instructions: You proteans should show off more.

achievements.name: Divination Break
achievements.description: So cold...
achievements.instructions: The frozen thread shattered.

achievements.name: Unwilted
achievements.description: Vivid recollection of a forgotten memory.
achievements.instructions: Flourish anew like it was yesterday.

achievements.name: Finality
achievements.description: High stakes, no regrets.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the Sudden Death mod enabled!

achievements.name: Perfectionist
achievements.description: Accept nothing but the best.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the Perfect mod enabled!

achievements.name: Rock Around The Clock
achievements.description: You can't stop the rock.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the Hard Rock mod enabled!

achievements.name: Time And A Half
achievements.description: Having a right ol' time. One and a half of them, almost.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the DoubleTime mod enabled!

achievements.name: Sweet Rave Party
achievements.description: Founded in the fine tradition of changing things that were just fine as they were.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the Nightcore mod enabled!

achievements.name: Blindsight
achievements.description: I can see just perfectly.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the Hidden mod enabled!

achievements.name: Are You Afraid Of The Dark?
achievements.description: Harder than it looks, probably because it's hard to look.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the Flashlight mod enabled!

achievements.name: Dial It Right Back
achievements.description: Sometimes you just want to take it easy.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the Easy mod enabled!

achievements.name: Risk Averse
achievements.description: Safety nets are fun!
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the No Fail mod enabled!

achievements.name: Slowboat
achievements.description: You got there. Eventually.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the HalfTime mod enabled!

achievements.name: Burned Out
achievements.description: One cannot always spin to win.
achievements.instructions: completing a map with the Spun Out mod enabled!

achievements.name: 500 Combo
achievements.description: 500 big ones! You're moving up in the world!
achievements.instructions: aiming for a combo of 500 or higher on any beatmap

achievements.name: 750 Combo
achievements.description: 750 notes back to back? Woah.
achievements.instructions: aiming for a combo of 750 or higher on any beatmap

achievements.name: 1,000 Combo
achievements.description: A thousand reasons why you rock at this game.
achievements.instructions: aiming for a combo of at least 1,000 on any beatmap (try a marathon)

achievements.name: 2,000 Combo
achievements.description: Nothing can stop you now.
achievements.instructions: aiming for a combo of at least 2,000 on any beatmap (try a marathon)

achievements.name: 5,000 Plays
achievements.description: There's a lot more where that came from.

achievements.name: 15,000 Plays
achievements.description: Must.. click.. circles..

achievements.name: 25,000 Plays
achievements.description: There's no going back.

achievements.name: 50,000 Plays
achievements.description: You're here forever.

achievements.name: I Can See The Top
achievements.description: Your dedication has paid off. Welcome to the top 50,000!

achievements.name: The Gradual Rise
achievements.description: There's no stopping you, is there? Welcome to the top 10,000!

achievements.name: Scaling Up
achievements.description: Welcome to the top 5,000. Never give up!

achievements.name: Approaching The Summit
achievements.description: Pro tier. Welcome to the top 1,000!

achievements.name: Catch 20,000 fruits
achievements.description: That is a lot of dietary fiber.

achievements.name: 30,000 Drum Hits
achievements.description: Did that drum have a face?

achievements.name: 40,000 Keys
achievements.description: Just the start of the rainbow.

achievements.name: Catch 200,000 fruits
achievements.description: So, I heard you like fruit...

achievements.name: 300,000 Drum Hits
achievements.description: The rhythm never stops.

achievements.name: 400,000 Keys
achievements.description: Four hundred thousand and still not even close.

achievements.name: Catch 2,000,000 fruits
achievements.description: Downright healthy.

achievements.name: 3,000,000 Drum Hits
achievements.description: Truly, the Don of dons.

achievements.name: 4,000,000 Keys
achievements.description: Is this the end of the rainbow?

achievements.name: 30,000,000 Drum Hits
achievements.description: Your rhythm, eternal.

achievements.name: Catch 20,000,000 fruits
achievements.description: Nothing left behind.

achievements.name: 40,000,000 Keys
achievements.description: When someone asks which keys you play, the answer is now 'yes'.

achievements.name: Rising Star
achievements.description: Can't go forward without the first steps.

achievements.name: My First Don
achievements.description: Marching to the beat of your own drum. Literally.

achievements.name: A Slice Of Life
achievements.description: Hey, this fruit catching business isn't bad.

achievements.name: First Steps
achievements.description: It isn't 9-to-5, but 1-to-9. Keys, that is.

achievements.name: Constellation Prize
achievements.description: Definitely not a consolation prize. Now things start getting hard!

achievements.name: Katsu Katsu Katsu
achievements.description: Hora! Ikuzo!

achievements.name: Dashing Ever Forward
achievements.description: Fast is how you do it.

achievements.name: No Normal Player
achievements.description: Not anymore, at least.

achievements.name: Building Confidence
achievements.description: Oh, you've SO got this.

achievements.name: Not Even Trying
achievements.description: Muzukashii? Not even.

achievements.name: Zesty Disposition
achievements.description: No scurvy for you, not with that much fruit.

achievements.name: Impulse Drive
achievements.description: Not quite hyperspeed, but getting close.

achievements.name: Insanity Approaches
achievements.description: You're not twitching, you're just ready.

achievements.name: Face Your Demons
achievements.description: The first trials are now behind you, but are you a match for the Oni?

achievements.name: Hyperdash ON!
achievements.description: Time and distance is no obstacle to you.

achievements.name: Hyperspeed
achievements.description: Woah.

achievements.name: These Clarion Skies
achievements.description: Everything seems so clear now.

achievements.name: The Demon Within
achievements.description: No rest for the wicked.

achievements.name: It's Raining Fruit
achievements.description: And you can catch them all.

achievements.name: Ever Onwards
achievements.description: Another challenge is just around the corner.

achievements.name: Above and Beyond
achievements.description: A cut above the rest.

achievements.name: Drumbreaker
achievements.description: Too strong.

achievements.name: Fruit Ninja
achievements.description: Legendary techniques.

achievements.name: Another Surpassed
achievements.description: Is there no limit to your skills?

achievements.name: Supremacy
achievements.description: All marvel before your prowess.

achievements.name: The Godfather
achievements.description: You are the Don of Dons.

achievements.name: Dreamcatcher
achievements.description: No fruit, only dreams now.

achievements.name: Extra Credit
achievements.description: See me after class.

achievements.name: Absolution
achievements.description: My god, you're full of stars!

achievements.name: Rhythm Incarnate
achievements.description: Feel the beat. Become the beat.

achievements.name: Lord of the Catch
achievements.description: Your kingdom kneels before you.

achievements.name: Maniac
achievements.description: There's just no stopping you.

achievements.name: Event Horizon
achievements.description: No force dares to pull you under.
achievements.instructions: Stare into the abyss, and pass the trial of any 9 star map.

achievements.name: Phantasm
achievements.description: Fevered is your passion, extraordinary is your skill.
achievements.instructions: Approach the limit of human endurance, and pass a 10 star map.

achievements.name: Totality
achievements.description: All the notes. Every single one.

achievements.name: Keeping Time
achievements.description: Don, then katsu. Don, then katsu..

achievements.name: Sweet And Sour
achievements.description: Apples and oranges, literally.

achievements.name: Keystruck
achievements.description: The beginning of a new story.

achievements.name: Business As Usual
achievements.description: Two to go, please.

achievements.name: To Your Own Beat
achievements.description: Straight and steady.

achievements.name: Reaching The Core
achievements.description: The seeds of future success.

achievements.name: Keying In
achievements.description: Finding your groove.

achievements.name: Building Steam
achievements.description: Hey, this isn't so bad.

achievements.name: Big Drums
achievements.description: Bigger scores to match.

achievements.name: Clean Platter
achievements.description: Clean only of failure. It is completely full, otherwise.

achievements.name: Hyperflow
achievements.description: You can *feel* the rhythm.

achievements.name: Moving Forward
achievements.description: Bet you feel good about that.

achievements.name: Adversity Overcome
achievements.description: Difficult? Not for you.

achievements.name: Between The Rain
achievements.description: No umbrella needed.

achievements.name: Breakthrough
achievements.description: Many skills mastered, rolled into one.

achievements.name: Paradigm Shift
achievements.description: Surprisingly difficult.

achievements.name: Demonslayer
achievements.description: An Oni felled forevermore.

achievements.name: Addicted
achievements.description: That was an overdose?

achievements.name: Everything Extra
achievements.description: Giving your all is giving everything you have.

achievements.name: Anguish Quelled
achievements.description: Don't choke.

achievements.name: Rhythm's Call
achievements.description: Heralding true skill.

achievements.name: Quickening
achievements.description: A dash above normal limits.

achievements.name: Level Breaker
achievements.description: Finesse beyond reason.

achievements.name: Never Give Up
achievements.description: Excellence is its own reward.

achievements.name: Time Everlasting
achievements.description: Not a single beat escapes you.

achievements.name: Supersonic
achievements.description: Faster than is reasonably necessary.

achievements.name: Step Up
achievements.description: A precipice rarely seen.

achievements.name: Aberration
achievements.description: They said it couldn't be done. They were wrong.

achievements.name: The Drummer's Throne
achievements.description: Percussive brilliance befitting royalty alone.

achievements.name: Dashing Scarlet
achievements.description: Speed beyond mortal reckoning.

achievements.name: Behind The Veil
achievements.description: Supernatural!

achievements.name: Chosen
achievements.description: Reign among the Prometheans, where you belong.
achievements.instructions: Triumph over one of the hardest beatmaps ever made, and FC a 9 star map.

achievements.name: Unfathomable
achievements.description: You have no equal.
achievements.instructions: Cement your place among legends, and FC any 10 star map.
